Script_Contents as B = SCRIPT_LOAD( script_name as C [, Password as C ] )

argument.name: script_name
argument.description: The name of a script. Character

argument.name: Password
argument.description: Optional. The password needed to open a script if it is password protected. Character

page.description: Return script contents (optional password can be used to load protected scripts).
page.discussion: The SCRIPT_LOAD() functions returns a character string or blob that contains the contents of Script_Name. If the script has been password protected, you need to specify the Password in order to retrieve the script. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: Loads the script into a variable, "x".
